topFaults.title: Pressure shift late
topFaults.why: Low point drifts back and contact gets inconsistent.
topFaults.fix: Get to lead side by P5–P6, then rotate.

topFaults.title: Flip risk
topFaults.why: Handle stalls and the hands try to save the face.
topFaults.fix: Keep the chest turning; handle forward through impact.

topFaults.title: Early extension
topFaults.why: Hips move toward the ball and you lose space.
topFaults.fix: Keep pelvis depth; rotate around your posture.

powerLeaks.title: Pressure shift late
powerLeaks.why: If pressure stays back, you can’t post and rotate hard through impact.

drills.title: Step-to-Lead-Side (timing)
drills.how: Make slow swings. As the club reaches the top, step into your lead foot before starting down. Then rotate through.
drills.why: Forces pressure shift before rotation so low point moves forward.

drills.title: Brush the Line (low point)
drills.how: Draw a line on turf. Make swings brushing the ground *in front* of the line, not behind it.
drills.why: Moves low point forward and improves compression.

powerLeaks.title: Flip risk
powerLeaks.why: A flip bleeds speed and makes strike/face unpredictable.

drills.title: Impact Bag (handle forward)
drills.how: Hit an impact bag with half-swings: hands ahead, chest turning, lead wrist flat. Freeze for 2 seconds.
drills.why: Trains forward shaft lean and stops the flip.

drills.title: Split-Grip Swings
drills.how: Split your hands on the grip by 3–4 inches and make 8 smooth swings focusing on body rotation through.
drills.why: Reduces hand flip and teaches rotation-driven speed.

topFixes.title: Pressure shift late
topFixes.cue: Get to lead side by P5–P6, then rotate.

drills.title: Step-to-Lead-Side (timing)
drills.how: Make slow swings. As the club reaches the top, step into your lead foot before starting down. Then rotate through.
drills.why: Forces pressure shift before rotation so low point moves forward.

drills.title: Brush the Line (low point)
drills.how: Draw a line on turf. Make swings brushing the ground *in front* of the line, not behind it.
drills.why: Moves low point forward and improves compression.

topFixes.title: Flip risk
topFixes.cue: Keep the chest turning; handle forward through impact.

drills.title: Impact Bag (handle forward)
drills.how: Hit an impact bag with half-swings: hands ahead, chest turning, lead wrist flat. Freeze for 2 seconds.
drills.why: Trains forward shaft lean and stops the flip.

drills.title: Split-Grip Swings
drills.how: Split your hands on the grip by 3–4 inches and make 8 smooth swings focusing on body rotation through.
drills.why: Reduces hand flip and teaches rotation-driven speed.

topFixes.title: Early extension
topFixes.cue: Keep pelvis depth; rotate around your posture.

drills.title: Chair Butt-Line (early extension)
drills.how: Set a chair lightly behind your hips at setup. Make slow swings keeping your hips from moving into the chair early.
drills.why: Trains pelvis depth so you don’t stand up and lose space.

drills.title: Wall Hip-Depth Rehearsal
drills.how: Stand with rear end near a wall. Turn back and through without letting hips drift toward the ball.
drills.why: Teaches depth + rotation instead of thrust.
